update.description:
Adds an MPI transpose using alltoall instead of alltoallv, which may be more optimized in some MPI implementations.  

Also adds some logic to make better use of grouped transposes after RHS evaluation.
update.title: Alltoall transpose

content.raw: For now I've left the FFTW transposes as the default, but we should run some speed tests between the new MPI transposes on large systems to decide if we should change this.  My experience on some local clusters here is that this latest mpi-alltoall transpose is fastest for my problems.
content.html: For now I've left the FFTW transposes as the default, but we should run some speed tests between the new MPI transposes on large systems to decide if we should change this. My experience on some local clusters here is that this latest mpi-alltoall transpose is fastest for my problems.
